name: TalkPykroe
commands: Haha! Lord Sages, a fine day today is, hm?
Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest lady in the land, Pykroe!
I see, a positively lucky maiden is very useful!
Certainly! My presence is most auspicious!
Nobody can rival her good fortune!
And Hyper!|I almost didn't notice you for a minute!
Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
Oh dear, Hyper.|Do remember, you are blessed too!|Not with my luck, but with a strong will!
Besides, where is Guy? He is most elusive!|I told him we would spend today trialing a secret technique!
Probably lounging around by himself somewhere.
Haha! Caught your attention? You'll have to wait and see!|It's very hush-hush.
Looking forward to seeing it! See ya, ladies!
Ah. Lord Sages, a fine day today is, hm?
Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest lady in the land, Pykroe!
I see, a positively lucky maiden is very useful!
Well, with the death of our friend, Guy...|My luck seems to have run dry...
It seems a moment of curses struck...
Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
Hyper, you're positively amazing, ignore his foolishness!
Clearly, not amazing enough to save Guy.
His death was clearly a fated event...|Destiny must be stronger than anyone's will.
Bah! Shut up!|Destiny? Preordained death?|If this is the work of the Goddess, then I hate her!
That would be a point of contention...
I'm sorry for your loss, ladies...
Why? You weren't even there.|I'm just, so angry... I couldn't do anything right!
Nonsense!|We can move past this, stronger than ever!
Look, I appreciate the concern.|But, it's so hard...|Sorry, Lord Sages, please go away...|I wouldn't want you to see... me cry.
It appears my luck has drained!|Both Hyper... Guy... Dead!
I'm sorry I couldn't have helped...
Clearly, this is all a trial!|A trial to make me stronger, much stronger.
Of course!|Otherwise this hurt, this pain... is all for nothing!
Now, you will have to excuse me.|I must steel my heart for the future, for them.
I'll be there to help you every step of the way, Pykroe.
source:
if;game.check_alive('Hyper') and game.check_alive('Guy')
    multi_add_portrait;Sages;Left;Pykroe;MidRight;Hyper;FarRight
    speak;Pykroe;Haha! Lord Sages, a fine day today is, hm?
    speak;Sages;Indeed it is... Pykroe?
    speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest lady in the land, Pykroe!
    speak;Sages;I see, a positively lucky maiden is very useful!
    speak;Pykroe;Certainly! My presence is most auspicious!
    speak;Hyper;Nobody can rival her good fortune!
    speak;Sages;And Hyper!|I almost didn't notice you for a minute!
    bop_portrait;Hyper
    speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
    speak;Pykroe;Oh dear, Hyper.|Do remember, you are blessed too!|Not with my luck, but with a strong will!
    speak;Sages;Yeah, what she said!
    speak;Hyper;Hmph, I guess that's nice.
    speak;Pykroe;Besides, where is Guy? He is most elusive!|I told him we would spend today trialing a secret technique!
    speak;Hyper;Probably lounging around by himself somewhere.
    speak;Sages;A secret technique?
    speak;Pykroe;Haha! Caught your attention? You'll have to wait and see!|It's very hush-hush.
    speak;Sages;Looking forward to seeing it! See ya, ladies!
elif;game.check_alive('Hyper') and game.check_dead('Guy')
    multi_add_portrait;Sages;Left;Pykroe;MidRight;Hyper;FarRight
    speak;Pykroe;Ah. Lord Sages, a fine day today is, hm?
    speak;Sages;Indeed it is... Pykroe?
    speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest lady in the land, Pykroe!
    speak;Sages;I see, a positively lucky maiden is very useful!
    speak;Pykroe;Well, with the death of our friend, Guy...|My luck seems to have run dry...
    speak;Hyper;It seems a moment of curses struck...
    speak;Sages;Curses...|Oh, Hyper! You're here too!
    speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
    speak;Pykroe;Hyper, you're positively amazing, ignore his foolishness!
    speak;Sages;Yeah, what she said!
    speak;Hyper;Clearly, not amazing enough to save Guy.
    speak;Pykroe;His death was clearly a fated event...|Destiny must be stronger than anyone's will.
    speak;Hyper;Bah! Shut up!|Destiny? Preordained death?|If this is the work of the Goddess, then I hate her!
    speak;Sages;That would be a point of contention...
    speak;Pykroe;Oh dear, Hyper! I...
    speak;Sages;I'm sorry for your loss, ladies...
    speak;Hyper;Why? You weren't even there.|I'm just, so angry... I couldn't do anything right!
    speak;Pykroe;Nonsense!|We can move past this, stronger than ever!
    speak;Hyper;Look, I appreciate the concern.|But, it's so hard...|Sorry, Lord Sages, please go away...|I wouldn't want you to see... me cry.
    speak;Sages;Of course, farewell...
elif;game.check_dead('Hyper') and game.check_dead('Guy')
    multi_add_portrait;Sages;Left;Pykroe;Right
    speak;Pykroe;Ah. Lord Sages...
    speak;Sages;Hey, Pykroe...
    speak;Pykroe;It appears my luck has drained!|Both Hyper... Guy... Dead!
    speak;Sages;I'm sorry I couldn't have helped...
    speak;Pykroe;Clearly, this is all a trial!|A trial to make me stronger, much stronger.
    speak;Sages;Is that right...
    speak;Pykroe;Of course!|Otherwise this hurt, this pain... is all for nothing!
    speak;Sages;...
    speak;Pykroe;Now, you will have to excuse me.|I must steel my heart for the future, for them.
    speak;Sages;I'll be there to help you every step of the way, Pykroe.
end
multi_remove_portrait;Sages;Pykroe;Hyper
remove_talk;Sages;Pykroe
remove_talk;Sages;Hyper
